page_content:
* *Education*.
	* The department conducts studies in the fields of:
		* mathematics (read about recruitment for the mathematics major (link: https://www.mat.umk.pl/web/wmii/rekrutacja/matematyka))
		* mathematics and economics (read about recruitment for this major (link: https://www.mat.umk.pl/web/wmii/rekrutacja/matematyka-i-ekonomia))
		* applied mathematics - first degree engineering studies (read about recruitment for the direction of applied mathematics (link: https://www.mat.umk.pl/web/wmii/rekrutacja/matematyka-stosowana))
		* computer science (read about recruitment for the direction of computer science (link: https://www.mat.umk.pl/web/wmii/rekrutacja/informatyka))
		* computer science-engineering studies (read about recruiting for this direction).

	* In 2010, by a resolution of the Presidium of the State Accreditation Commission, education in the field of *mathematics* at the Faculty of Mathematics and Informatics of the Nicolaus Copernicus University was *rated* *highly distinctive*.
	* In 2015, the Polish Accreditation Committee awarded the Faculty of Mathematics and Computer Science a positive institutional evaluation covering all fields of study.

* *Science*.
	* The Faculty of Mathematics and Computer Science at UMK always receives the *highest category* in the classification of scientific units (previously A, A+, in 2001-2004, 2005-2009, category I; in the assessment of scientific activity of units for the years *2009-2012* announced in autumn 2013, the Faculty of Mathematics and Computer Science at UMK received *category A*), intensive scientific research is conducted by world-class specialists.
	The *Faculty has from the beginning been authorized to confer *degrees*: PhD and PhD in mathematics in the field of mathematics
	* In 2017 - thanks to mathematics - Nicolaus Copernicus University in Torun was noted for the first time in the prestigious *Academic Ranking of World Universities* (ARWU), one of the three most respected and most widely commented rankings of universities in the world. Indeed, UMK appeared in the so-called *Shanghai ranking. *Shanghai ranking* at position 301-400 in the natural sciences in the research area: *MATHEMATICS* (http://www.shanghairanking.com/Shanghairanking-Subject-Rankings/mathematics.html).

metadata.title: Study with us!
tags: Faculty of Mathematics and Computer Science (WMiI)

page_content:
*Technologies*.
* A total of *18 computer labs* with modern equipment (260 workstations).
* Free access to a *faculty* *radio network* covering the entire building.
* *3 server centers*, running Linux, FreeBSD and Windows Server.
* *Mobile Technology Lab* (iOS, Android, Windows Phone) - 3 labs.
* Specialized laboratory for *graphics and multimedia*.
* Advanced laboratory of *electronics and metrology*.
* Laboratory with modern *Apple computers*.
* *Open Computer Lab* - 6 dedicated boxes with devices from Apple (iMac, iPhone, iPad, iWatch), Microsoft (HoloLens, Surface Studio), or Google (Pixel,Nexus).
* *General access* computer workstations in the Student Project Studio (7 workstations).
* Access to *2 3D printers*.
* Free software for students as part of Microsoft's *Microsoft Imagine* program.

*Library*.
* Extensive *book collection* (it costs about 150K annually to update it).
* Professional staff.
* Spacious reading room (photos on the library website (link: https://www.mat.umk.pl/web/biblioteka-wmii)).
* Sale of cards for departmental photocopiers.

* Facilities*.
* Building adapted for people with *disabilities*.
* *An auditorium* with 350 seats in the new part of the Faculty (completed in 2007).
* *Student club* (with an area of 100 m2) with tables: billiard and table tennis.
* A large *bar* (good coffee and tasty dinners).
* Plenty of *common space*: lobby with amphitheater, spacious corridors equipped with tables and chairs
* A *gallery* of works by staff and students of the Faculty of Fine Arts (in a modern communication link).

metadata.title: Technologies
tags: Faculty of Mathematics and Computer Science (WMiI)

page_content:
* * *Traditions*.
	* The Faculty of Mathematics and Computer Science at UMK was established in 1993.
	* However: mathematical sciences have been developed at UMK *from the beginning* of the university's existence (first as part of the departments and then as part of the Institute of Mathematics functioning within the structure of UMK's Faculty of Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry); in the mid-sixties, the specialization "numerical section" was created in mathematical studies, giving rise to the faculty of Computer Science.

* *For the student community.
	* A thriving *Student Government* (link: http://samorzad.mat.uni.torun.pl/).
	* Two active student scientific societies: UMK Mathematics Study Circle (link: http://knm.mat.uni.torun.pl/KNM), Computer Science Study Circle (link: http://www.mat.umk.pl/web/kni/glowna).
	* *The Friendly Dean's Office* - the WMiI Dean's Office was the winner in the competition (link: http://www.samorzad.umk.pl/index.php?module=aktualnosci&id=59) in 2011.
	* Anonymous electronic survey system for classes.

* *For the best students*.
	* Scholarships
	* Classes to prepare for participation in international math and programming competitions.
	* *Individual scientific supervision*.
	* Participation in seminars, conferences, competitions.
	* Information from July 2017: The Faculty of Mathematics and Computer Science at the Nicolaus Copernicus University has obtained funding for the implementation of two projects in the venture titled. *"Best of the Best!2.0"* implemented within the framework of the Operational Program Knowledge Education Development 2014-2020. The aim is to *support outstandingly talented students in the development of their scientific activity, innovation, creativity*, which will be done by supporting their participation in international competitions, competitions or conferences.

* *And in addition.
	* The Faculty is part of *UMK (link: http://umk.pl/)* - *the fifth university* in the 2012 Perspektywa and Rzeczpospolita Ranking of Higher Education Institutions in Poland, *the seventh university in the scientific ranking of Polish* *universities* by Polityka weekly in 2013 and 2014, *fifth among universities and ninth among all state universities* in the 2014 Perspectives ranking.
	* The Faculty building is located right next to (about 500 m) the beautiful *Stara Park* (link: http://www.torun.pl/pl/turystyka/tylko-w-toruniu/torunski-gotyk).
	* Access is easy (both for Torun residents and people from outside the city).
	* Planners arrange a friendly schedule :)
